DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: Pasta Group Wants Import Quotas : The National Pasta Assn . said in Washington that it will demand quotas or tariffs on imported pasta if President Clinton decides to curb Canadian imports of durum_wheat , which is used to make pasta . The trade group will also formally ask the Administration to halt subsidies for durum_wheat exports while wheat import restraints are in_effect . The big winners will be foreign pasta producers , who will increase their already significant exports to the United States , she said .
